main event: A family observed a single UFO in the southwest section of Wilmington, Delaware on 29 March 1966.
interesting points: The UFO was described as red, shaped like a half grapefruit, and appeared to have red, green, and white colors., The object moved slowly southward and appeared to move from side to side., Reports from the Air Police confirmed that their personnel had also seen a similar object., Major Ruddy initially thought the object was a planet, later confirmed to be Venus., A similar UFO was reported by several people the night before.
sighted object: a half grapefruit shaped object with red, green, and white colors
witness description: a family and Air Police personnel
